subject:
Re: SMB2 connection is not possible to Vista with smbclient of
	Samba 4.0.0TP4
body:
Hi,

On 2007/05/18, at 14:00, Stefan (metze) Metzmacher wrote:

 >smbclient doesn't support SMB2, as our SMB2 support is
 >very experimatal! We have a start of the server code
 >which is disabled by default and we have some SMB2-*
 >tests in smbtorture.

so Thank you for an answer!
I understood it.

 >Why is that needed for you?

out of curiosity,
I examined whether I could make any new product with SMB2.
I try to wait.
And I will report it when a bug matched.

thanks and cheers.

---rokino.jp---
